Skill.label: C: 8-31 Blight (vaal blight whenever u can get it)
ED 6 Link Setup - Energy Leech > Lvl 3 Empower

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
GEMS - ACT - NPC - QUEST
Tip: The letters represent what to change. For example Change skills marked with A with other skills marked with A and B to B and so on.
------------Leveling-------------
A 1 - 4: Freezing Pulse
Freezing Pulse - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate Onslaught Support - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission (This can also be Muled on a Scion)
A 4 - 12: Frost Bomb
Frost Bomb - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs Arcane Surge Support - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission Onslaught Support - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission (This can also be Muled on a Scion)
B 4 - 12: Contagion
Contagion - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs Void Manipulation support - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Arcane Surge Support - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission
C 8 - 31: Blight (Vaal Blight when you can get it)
Blight - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate (Vaal would need to be found/Traded/Corrupting a Blight Gem) Void Manipulation support - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Infused Channeling - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission
A: 12 - 18: Essence Drain
Essence Drain - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission Void Manipulation support - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Arcane Surge Support - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission
A: 18 - 31: Essence Drain
Essence Drain - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission Controlled Destruction - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel Void Manipulation support - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Arcane Surge Support - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission
A 31 Onwards: Essence Drain Essence Drain - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission Efficacy support - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Swift Affliction - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Controlled Destruction - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel
----------Leveling Auras-------------
24 Onwards: Malevolence
Malevolence - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love
24 Onwards: Despair
Despair - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love
--------------Endgame---------------
Essence Drain
Essence Drain - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission Efficacy support - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Controlled Destruction - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel Swift Affliction - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Void Manipulation support - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Energy Leech Support - Act 3 - Clarrisa - A Fixture of Fate
Empower Level 3 - This would need to be found or traded for and can be switched for Energy Leech Support
Contagion - 4L Setup
Contagion - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs Increased Area of Effect - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare Intensify support - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Faster Casting support - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel
Contagion - Item Rarity Setup
Contagion - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs Increased Area of Effect - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare Intensify support - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Item Rarity support - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate
Vaal Blight
Vaal Blight (This would need to be found/Traded/Corrupting a Blight Gem) Efficacy support - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Infused Channeling - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission Controlled Destruction - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel
-------------Auras Endgame--------------
Malevolence
Malevolence - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love
Vaal Discipline
Vaal Discipline - Gate (This would need to be found/Traded/Corrupting a Blight Gem)
----------------Utility-----------------
Flame Dash
Flame Dash - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Arcane Surge support - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission
Shield Charge
Shield Charge - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate Faster Attacks - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel Fortify support - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate
Cast when Damage Taken
Cast When Damage Taken - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare Tempest Shield - Act 2 - Yeena - The Root of the Problem Vaal Molten Shell - (This would need to be found/Traded/Corrupting a Molten Shell Gem)
----------------CI Setup-----------------
Essence Drain
Essence Drain - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission Controlled Destruction - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel Swift Affliction - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Void Manipulation support - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Efficacy support - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Energy Leech Support - Act 3 - Clarrisa - A Fixture of Fate
Empower Level 3 - This would need to be found or traded for and can be switched for Energy Leech Support
Vaal Blight
Vaal Blight (This would need to be found/Traded/Corrupting a Blight Gem) Efficacy support - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Infused Channeling - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission Void Manipulation support - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute
Contagion - 4L Setup
Contagion - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs Increased Area of Effect - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare Intensify support - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Tempest Shield - Act 2 - Yeena - The Root of the Problem
Malevolence
Malevolence - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love
Wither
Wither - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Spell Totem support - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate
Flame Dash
Flame Dash - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Arcane Surge support - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission
Vaal Discipline
Vaal Discipline - This will need to be Traded for, Vaaling a Discipline or found in an Vaal Side Area
Shield Charge
Shield Charge - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate Faster Attacks - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel Fortify support - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate
Vaal Molten Shell
Vaal Molten Shell - This will need to be Traded for, Vaaling a Molten Shell or found in an Vaal Side Area
--------------------TIPS---------------------
THIS BUILD REQUIRES A JADE FLASK!!
Try to make sure you cap your resistances whenever possible (75, 75, 75) You can see this from the defence Panel on your character screen if you press the default key C. For everytime you kill Kitava your resistances will be reduced by 30 for a maximum of 60 reduced resistances after you kill Kitava the second time.
Get an Instant (Seething/Bubbling) Divine Life Flask as soon as you can. This flask is very important.
Try to get as much life as you can on any piece of gear where-ever you can, for examples of gear, refer to the items section and click the drop down menu between Early and End game.
